name: office-add-in-auth-aspnet-graph
title: Get OneDrive data using Microsoft Graph and MSAL.NET in an Office Add-in
shortDescription: Learn how to build a Microsoft Office Add-in that connects to Microsoft Graph, finds the first three workbooks stored in OneDrive for Business, fetches their filenames, and inserts the names into an Office document using Office.js.
longDescription: Learn how to build a Microsoft Office Add-in that connects to Microsoft Graph, finds the first three workbooks stored in OneDrive for Business, fetches their filenames, and inserts the names into an Office document using Office.js.

references.name: Authorize to Microsoft Graph from an Office Add-in
references.description: Your add-in can get authorization to Microsoft Graph data by obtaining an access token to Microsoft Graph from the Microsoft identity platform.
